Subject: Re: Triggerhappy's Lust
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"I, I'm not sure. THis is my first joy ride. Check youre scanners" he says.
He then sees Drag Strip moving in. "Hey glad you could make it" he teases
to Drag Strip. "SHut up, or Ill waste my anger on you" he said quickly.
Both kept following Triggerhappy, putting their motors into high speed.
